name: list-tools
description: Convert and extract list data between CSV, JSON, XML, YAML, SQL and more!
author: 1nVitr0

commands.title: Convert single column to simple list
Convert multiple columns to object list
Convert single column to simple list (pretty print)
Convert multiple columns to object list (pretty print)
Convert single column to simple list (without pretty print)
Convert multiple columns to object list (without pretty print)

list-tools.additionalFormats.description: additional formatting rules, can extend existing ones by using `base`

simpleList.description: Simple list options, if not specified simple lists are not supported

enclosure.description: Enclosure around entire list

delimitLastItem.description: If true, generate a delimiter for the last item as well

rest.description: Prefix for the rest of the items

string.description: Enclosure for string values, if char, it's used for both start and end

number.description: Enclosure for number values, if char, it's used for both start and end

boolean.description: Enclosure for boolean values, if char, it's used for both start and end

null.description: Enclosure for null values, if char, it's used for both start and end

test.description: Regular expression, that tests if the key must be enclosed

enclosure.description: Enclosure boundaries or char, if char, it's used for both start and end

replace.description: Replacement string, indexes like `$1` can be used

delimitSameLine.description: If false, items are separated by newlines, otherwise next spaced by given number of spaces

example.description: Example result shown in quick picks

parameters.description: Keyed List of available parameters queried when formatting the lst

header.description: Header options for csv-like formats, usually noKeys is set to `false`
